project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that enables users to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file.

task.name: Set up the project structure and dependencies
Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement calculation for the mean of specified columns
Implement calculation for the median of specified columns
Implement calculation for the mode of specified columns
Write tests for mean, median, and mode functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
